name: Chart Industries, Inc.
description: Chart Industries, Inc. is a leading global manufacturer of highly engineered equipment serving multiple markets, including industrial gas, energy, and biomedical. Founded in 1992 and headquartered in Ball Ground, Georgia, Chart specializes in cryogenic equipment used for the storage and distribution of liquefied gases. The company’s product offerings include storage tanks, vaporizers, and a range of other solutions for the liquefied natural gas (LNG) and hydrogen sectors. As energy transition trends accelerate, Chart is at the forefront of providing innovative solutions to reduce carbon emissions and enhance energy efficiency. Their commitment to sustainability is evident in their focus on clean energy applications, which include not only LNG but also hydrogen and renewable energy technologies. Chart's cutting-edge engineering capabilities, combined with a robust global presence, position it uniquely in the market to address the evolving needs of its customers. With a clear focus on driving progress in the energy sector, Chart Industries aims to facilitate a greener future through its advanced products and solutions.
